title: Scooter Startup Lime Raises $523 Million, Aims for 2022 Public Listing
sub_head: Investors including Uber, Fidelity and the Abu Dhabi Growth Fund are backing the startup
body:
Electric scooter and electric bike startup Lime has raised $523 million and is aiming to list company shares on public markets sometime next year, Chief Executive Wayne Ting said. The financing and goal for a public listing comes as Lime’s business of leasing short-term rides on its vehicles recovers from the disruption caused by the coronavirus pandemic.
In an interview, Mr. Ting declined to say what form such a listing could take.
